channel.title: [PI] Help Please
channel.description:
Ok I want to do two things in my Pi server.
1. Make a chest in the wildy or whereever that when u click on it, you get items and 2. Make a store that uses tokuls or donor tix or something as a currency not gp
If you can tell me how to do these that'd be great. TY!

item.title: [PI] Help Please
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

[quote=“mikirune, post:3, topic:389412”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=485330.msg3556311#msg3556311 date=1301929407]
This is common knowledge. Get a guide on how to make a PI PK points reward system and remake it with what you want. And the chest is so easy a baby could do it…
[/quote]
Im a newbie to this and I already have a pk point system. Found a guide on that and did it. But I want a donor store that uses tokuls and stuff. umm and if you would have told me how to do the chest thing, I probaly wouldn’t have [–] repped you. If you can tell me how to do it then Ill [++] rep you.[/quote]

You cant rep – or rep ++ dummy don’t act like a smart ass

[quote=“durial12, post:4, topic:389412”]Don’t you need 25 rep to rep++? Just saying. And thats no reason to rep-- him. All help on his is completely voluntary. The fact that someone has taken their own time in reading your post should be worth something to you.[/quote]you need 15 to rep

Read full topic
